title: RA (Royal Allegiance) eSports Looking for Subs D3+ & Manager
body:
**Sub Player**

We are looking for a Diamond 3 + Sub 
Preferably someone who can pick up champions on request to simulate proper training in the absence of players.
Can work in a professional and friendly environment 
Also represent themselves professionally  to other teams during scrims and tournament matches.
Play to the best of abilities and have the correct mentality for team play.

**Manager**

Be able to actively set up scrims weekly.
Know the proper scrim chat adequate
Be able to work with players of different age groups
Be able to setup players for scrims so they are on time (you are not required to stay for matches)

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/RAeSports/)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/RA_eSports?lang=en)
[Website](http://raesports.webs.com/)

Add Wolves if you are interested
